title: Rasgulla Tin Pack
name: Rasgulla Tin Pack
description: Soft and spongy Bengali rasgulla soaked in sugar syrup. Made with fresh chenna and served in traditional tin packaging. A classic Bengali sweet loved by all.
shortDescription: Soft Bengali rasgulla in sugar syrup, 1kg tin

title: Gulab Jamun Tin Pack
name: Gulab Jamun Tin Pack
description: Golden brown milk solid dumplings soaked in aromatic sugar syrup flavored with cardamom and rose water. Ready to eat, packed in convenient tin.
shortDescription: Golden brown milk dumplings in sugar syrup, 1kg tin
storageInstructions: Store in cool place. Refrigerate for extended freshness.

title: Motichoor Ladoo
name: Motichoor Ladoo
description: Traditional round sweet made from fine gram flour pearls, ghee, and sugar. Rich in flavor with a hint of saffron and cardamom. Perfect for celebrations.
shortDescription: Traditional gram flour ladoo with saffron, 500g pack
storageInstructions: Store in airtight container in cool, dry place.

title: Soan Papdi Gift Pack
name: Soan Papdi Gift Pack
description: Light and flaky traditional sweet made with gram flour, ghee, and sugar. Melts in mouth with delicate texture. Perfect for bulk gifting and festivals.
shortDescription: Light flaky traditional sweet, 500g gift pack
storageInstructions: Store in airtight container. Avoid moisture.

title: Malai Peda
name: Malai Peda
description: Soft and dense milk-based sweet with rich creamy texture. Made with fresh malai, sugar, and cardamom. Comes in beautiful decorated boxes.
shortDescription: Soft creamy milk-based sweet in decorated box, 500g
storageInstructions: Must be refrigerated. Consume within 4 days.

title: Cham Cham
name: Cham Cham
description: Colorful Bengali sweet made from chenna and served in sugar syrup. Soft, spongy texture with attractive colors. Traditional Bengali delicacy.
shortDescription: Colorful Bengali sweet in sugar syrup, 500g pack
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated. Best consumed fresh within 3 days.

title: Rabri Jar
name: Rabri Jar
description: Thick sweetened milk dessert with layers of malai, flavored with cardamom and garnished with nuts. Served in convenient glass jars for modern presentation.
shortDescription: Thick sweetened milk dessert in glass jar, 200ml
storageInstructions: Keep refrigerated. Consume within 3 days of opening.

title: Chocolate Dry Fruit Mithai

shortDescription: Premium fusion chocolate mithai with dry fruits in elegant box

title: Modak
name: Modak
description: Traditional Maharashtrian steamed sweet dumplings made from rice flour with a delicious filling of grated coconut and jaggery, flavored with cardamom. Specially prepared during Ganesh Chaturthi.
